<js>

var book = {
	name: o('h2').match(/ã€Š(.*)ã€‹.*/)[1],
	author: o('h2').match(/.*ä½œè€…ï¼š(.*)é¦–å‘.*/)[1],
	kind: o('.bookIntro p strong:eq(0)') + ',' + o('.bookIntro strong:eq(1)').replace(/ä¸­|å·²/, ''),
	latest: o('h4 b').replace(/^(æ­£æ–‡|VIPç« èŠ‚|æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚)?(\s+|_)|[\(ï¼ˆã€].*[æ±‚æ›´è°¢ä¹å‘æ¨].*/g, '') + ' â€¢ ' + o('h4').match(/.*\((\d+-\d+-\d+)\).*/)[1],
	intro: 'ã€€ã€€æœ€è¿‘æ›´æ–°:' + o('h4').match(/.*\((\d+-\d+-\d+)\).*/)[1] + '\n' + o('#newIntro').replace(/\[ .*\]/, ''),
	cover: J.select('.bookPic img').attr('src'),
	url: J.select('.viewTool a:eq(0)').attr('href'),
